title: store.datalad.org should point to a working dataset
body:
<http://store.datalad.org/> gives the following example:

> In order to obtain DataLad datasets from the RIA store, provide the relevant dataset ID prefixed with ria+http://store.datalad.org# in a datalad clone command like this:
>
>     datalad clone ria+http://store.datalad.org#d1ca308e-3d17-11ea-bf3b-f0d5bf7b5561 myclone

Running that locally, it looks like the dataset doesn't exist.

```
% datalad clone ria+http://store.datalad.org#d1ca308e-3d17-11ea-bf3b-f0d5bf7b5561 myclone                                                          [ERROR  ] Failed to clone from any candidate source URL. Encountered errors per each url were:
| - http://store.datalad.org/d1c/a308e-3d17-11ea-bf3b-f0d5bf7b5561
  CommandError: 'git clone --progress http://store.datalad.org/d1c/a308e-3d17-11ea-bf3b-f0d5bf7b5561 /tmp/dl-WwmnTdy/myclone' failed with exitcode 128 [err: 'Cloning into '/tmp/dl-WwmnTdy/myclone'...
fatal: repository 'http://store.datalad.org/d1c/a308e-3d17-11ea-bf3b-f0d5bf7b5561/' not found']
- http://store.datalad.org/d1c/a308e-3d17-11ea-bf3b-f0d5bf7b5561/.git
  CommandError: 'git clone --progress http://store.datalad.org/d1c/a308e-3d17-11ea-bf3b-f0d5bf7b5561/.git /tmp/dl-WwmnTdy/myclone' failed with exitcode 128 [err: 'Cloning into '/tmp/dl-WwmnTdy/myclone'...
fatal: repository 'http://store.datalad.org/d1c/a308e-3d17-11ea-bf3b-f0d5bf7b5561/.git/' not found'] [install(/tmp/dl-WwmnTdy/myclone)] 
install(error): /tmp/dl-WwmnTdy/myclone (dataset) [Failed to clone from any candidate source URL. Encountered errors per each url were:
- http://store.datalad.org/d1c/a308e-3d17-11ea-bf3b-f0d5bf7b5561
  CommandError: 'git clone --progress http://store.datalad.org/d1c/a308e-3d17-11ea-bf3b-f0d5bf7b5561 /tmp/dl-WwmnTdy/myclone' failed with exitcode 128 [err: 'Cloning into '/tmp/dl-WwmnTdy/myclone'...
fatal: repository 'http://store.datalad.org/d1c/a308e-3d17-11ea-bf3b-f0d5bf7b5561/' not found']
- http://store.datalad.org/d1c/a308e-3d17-11ea-bf3b-f0d5bf7b5561/.git
  CommandError: 'git clone --progress http://store.datalad.org/d1c/a308e-3d17-11ea-bf3b-f0d5bf7b5561/.git /tmp/dl-WwmnTdy/myclone' failed with exitcode 128 [err: 'Cloning into '/tmp/dl-WwmnTdy/myclone'...
fatal: repository 'http://store.datalad.org/d1c/a308e-3d17-11ea-bf3b-f0d5bf7b5561/.git/' not found']]
```
